channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Long tyre width potholes as you approach and come onto the roundabout in the right lane turning onto Up Hatherley way., 18th November
item.description:
Right hand lane of the roundabout coming from Shurdgington Road turning into Up Hatherley way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: The whole junction is a mess because of the HGV from the business park, 18th November
item.description:
The junction with Delta way/ermin street and Hucclecote road. The resurfacing work of Hucclecote road stopped here which arguably is the worst part due to all the vehicles coming out of the business park. This needs looking at and not ignored for it to get worse. The fact it's been left is really poor. The right turning from the by pass into ermin street has terrible surfacing issues.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
